about_the_game:
Become one with the desert and keep your squad going with the Desert Corpsman Gear Set for Insurgents.

Contains six different cosmetic gear pieces:

- Desert Corpsman Turban
- Desert Corpsman Mask
- Desert Corpsman Shirt
- Desert Corpsman Sirwal
- Desert Corpsman Gloves
- Desert Corpsman Boots

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase and can be combined with other cosmetic gear pieces. They can be equipped in-game in the Customization menu, which can be accessed from the Main menu.

The Desert Corpsman Gear Set is included in the Resurgence Set Bundle.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
